title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Community Health System - CA
Interview Descriptions: Got a call a day after application and it went smooth. Not touch questions and the interviewer was very nice. She explained lots of hospital and unit culture. Got a job offer next day!
Interview Questions: What does nursing mean to you

title: LVN Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Community Health System - CA
Interview Descriptions: Lots of questions , fast , everyone was nice I’m only writing this because i am trying to look at another review but Glassdoor won’t let me bypass my personal review . I hate giving reviews
Interview Questions: How do you handle conflict

title: Administrative Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Community Health System - CA
Interview Descriptions: I was asked to interview through many rounds, with many leaders across the areas I will be working for. Leaders seem to care and ask lots of questions although they are busy. Some panels are too big for a 30 minute interview so I end up not having much time to ask my questions.
Interview Questions: Tell me about yourself Where do you see yourself in 5 years? Why do you want to work here?

title: Registered Nurse, BSN Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Community Health System - CA
Interview Descriptions: It response after a week after I applied online.HR called firstly,- why do you want to work here? Then Hiring manager, introduce yourself, your strengths, and weaknesses. Ask some clinical questions.
Interview Questions: Introduce yourself. and why you want to work here

title: Biomedical Technician Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Community Health System - CA
Interview Descriptions: Interview process was done through a virtual meeting with a manager, and two supervisors. The questions asked were basic technical questions straight out of school. If you're an experienced technician, you may want to brush up what you learned from school many years ago that you may usually or never used at work.
Interview Questions: What's the difference between a torx and a philips?

title: ER PCA Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Community Health System - CA
Interview Descriptions: Charge Nurses ask typical questions about previous work experience, how you handle difficult people and situations, and strengths and weaknesses. Pretty casual, turnover is relatively high so it's not overly intense.
Interview Questions: Do you have a problem working nights?

title: Pharmacy Technician Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Community Health System - CA
Interview Descriptions: Standard review process involving management team.  The prescreening process was through the HR department and then an interview with the Department Manager. This process was standard compared to other companies I have interviewed with in the past.
Interview Questions: I was asked standard interview questions.

title: Patient Care Tech Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at Community Health System - CA (Fresno, CA) in Apr 2022
Interview Descriptions:
Applied, got a call couple hours later to set up interview for the next day.
The interview itself was through zoom. 
I had two gentlemen on the call. The hiring manager and the assistant manager I believe. 
It was intimidating, they were very straight to the point about where I plan to go as far as my education and career.
Interview Questions: Why do I want to work for cmc, where do I see myself in 5 years, my experience in healthcare, can I commit myself to working full time in a high acuity setting.

title: Pharmacy Technician Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Community Health System - CA
Interview Descriptions: Very selective. Phone screen and no reply.  I have applied over 13 times. Interview screen simple. But it can be tough to land the call.  I’m very sad. I will keep trying.
Interview Questions: They asked me for availability.

title: Physician Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Community Health System - CA
Interview Descriptions: Quick to the point. No clinical questions. People working there seem content with the clinical volume. Provided hotel accommodations for familt when came to interview. Contract negotiation was easy and quick.
Interview Questions: Why this town, can provide references from last employer etc

title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Community Health System - CA (Clovis, CA)
Interview Descriptions: The interview itself went very well. After the interview, I found out there was a conflict of interest and one of my interviewers happened to be related to a former classmate. The interviewer had been sharing details of my interview with her relative DURING my interview. I found this to be extremely unprofessional. I sent a thank you email to my interviewers and emailed again two weeks later to follow up. I never heard anything back. I decided to express my concerns to HR and they did nothing.
Interview Questions: What do you think about patient satisfaction?

title: Registered Nurse, Emergency Room Interview
Application Type: I applied through other source. I interviewed at Community Health System - CA
Interview Descriptions: Very smooth and great interview process. I felt confident and at ease conversing with management.  I received an offer the very next day.  I'm happy to have had this interview experience and this great opportunity!
Interview Questions: Describe a difficult scenario and how you handled it.

title: Registered Respiratory Therapist (RRT) Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Community Health System - CA (Fresno, CA)
Interview Descriptions: It was a panel interview with about 4 people. It went very well. They asked me basic questions like “tell me about yourself” and “how would you handle conflict”. They questions were not hard to answer and they made me feel really comfortable during the interview. (New graduate)
Interview Questions: How would you handle conflict in the work place?

title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Community Health System - CA (Fresno, CA) in Feb 2021
Interview Descriptions: Phone interview with video chat via google dou. Lasted about 30-40 minutes. The phone interview was more relaxed and casual than an inperson interview would have been. I am not sure if it was a good thing or not. But havent recieved a reply as well.
Interview Questions: Why do you want to work here

title: Counseling Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Community Health System - CA
Interview Descriptions: The interviewers at Community Medical Centers were extremely warm and inviting, and approached the interview as a way to get to know each other rather than as a quiz of skills or knowledge.
Interview Questions: Tell me about your background?

title: Patient Access Representative Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Community Health System - CA (Fresno, CA) in Jan 2021
Interview Descriptions: To quick, short and no time to speak or ask questions and when i tried to answers i was cut off by being asked another question   with no time to respond to the current question.
Interview Questions: What are your abilities  and what can you bring to our staff

title: Human Resources Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Community Health System - CA (Fresno, CA)
Interview Descriptions:
Good interview. Good human resource department. Good application website. Good applying process. Good interview process, and everything was not only good but also awesome. 

Benefits are also good. I read the benefits
Interview Questions: What were your Past experiences

title: Staffing Assistant Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Community Health System - CA
Interview Descriptions: Interview was scheduled within a week of applying. The talent acquisition was descriptive about the new process due to covid. The interview was quick video through the phone. I was happy that the interview went by really smooth.
Interview Questions: How do you feel working under pressure?

title: Sterile Processing Tech 2 Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Community Health System - CA (Fresno, CA) in Nov 2020
Interview Descriptions: I applied 3 days later received a phone call to set up a interview for the following  Monday. Interview went well. The Monday after HR call with an offer and I accepted.
Interview Questions:
Tell me about yourself?
How would you react to conflict with a coworker?
How do you handle pressure?
Where do you see yourself in 5 year?
What made me choose the path of Sterile Processing?

title: Security Employee Screener Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Community Health System - CA (Fresno, CA) in Aug 2020
Interview Descriptions: I did a virtual interview which didn't last longer than 30 min with a personnel from HR. She asked me a few general questions and told me I would hear from them within a week if I was selected or not.
Interview Questions:
Q: what is your experience?
Q: Why do you want to work here?
Q: what are my plans within the company?

title: RN - ICU Interview
Application Type: I applied through a staffing agency. The process took 3 weeks. I interviewed at Community Health System - CA (Fresno, CA) in Jul 2020
Interview Descriptions: Due to COVID there was two phone interviews to learn about the position and a Zoom meeting after the phone interviews. They also flew me out to tour the facility and the city.
Interview Questions: Describe your current struggles at your place of employment with COVID-19

title: Director Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Community Health System - CA
Interview Descriptions: Intrerview process was straight forward. I had 3 separate interviews: 1 - staff who would report to me, 1 - peer group of Directors, 1- Hiring Manager. Offer came in two weeks after last interview round.
Interview Questions: Questions were more situational... "How would you respond if ...", "Tell me a situation where ..."

title: Informatics Specialist Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at Community Health System - CA
Interview Descriptions: Received a phone screen interview approximately 1-2 weeks after submitting application.  When phone screened is passed moved to 2 panel interview approximately 1 hour for each panel.  Offer call was received a couple of weeks after the interview.
Interview Questions: what is your project management process?

title: Surgical Technologist Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1+ week. I interviewed at Community Health System - CA (Clovis, CA) in Jul 2019
Interview Descriptions: Quick and efficient. Relatable questions . Calm environment. Nurses were great about answering my questions and covering any and all info I needed to know about the hospital, working there, their expectations.
Interview Questions: Least favorite specialty?

title: RN I Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Community Health System - CA
Interview Descriptions: Very relaxed and friendly. Not intimidating at all. They even asked very peculiar questions like "who is your favorite YouTuber?". After the interview, I got a tour of the hospital and was introduced to others on the team. Overall positive experience
Interview Questions: How would you deal with bad management?

title: CNA Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at Community Health System - CA (Fresno, CA) in Sept 2018
Interview Descriptions: Met with HR,  talked about the company. Where I would see myself in 5 years. Talked about previous job duties. What I my will be responsibility would be. Very respectful asked many questions. I would say to be honest of why you want this job. Then in a couple days you will get a second interview.
Interview Questions: Why do you want to work here ? What are your weakness and strength ?

title: RN Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at Community Health System - CA (Fresno, CA) in Apr 2018
Interview Descriptions: Applied online and 2-3 weeks later got a phone call from the unit recruiter about an interview with the Unit Manager.  The Unit Manager was sweet and awesome. I thought the interview went great although I was super nervous (New Grad). 1-2 weeks later I got a call from the unit recruiter with an offer. I was in a dilemma because a couple days prior I was given another offer from another place. So I had to decline the offer, but hopefully, down the road, I'll get to work for them.
Interview Questions:
Why do you want to work here?

Scenario questions

What would your past instructors say about you?

How'd you describe yourself?

title: FNP-BC Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Community Health System - CA (Stockton, CA) in Apr 2018
Interview Descriptions: It was a good experience. Moved from different state. Was given air fare and accommodations for interview. The interview was with CMO , very intelligent but humble person. Made me at ease, have me a tour of the place and tried to provide me with feedback from other providers working there.
Interview Questions: Why would you want to work

title: Rda Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 6 months. I interviewed at Community Health System - CA (Stockton, CA)
Interview Descriptions: Applied 6 months ago heard back a month V very pleasant very cordial professional I sat before a panel of two women when was the supervisor of the entire site the other was the lead supervisor manager type person neither one of them know anything about the industry you could tell by the way they were speaking their body language and having to keep looking at their paperwork and then I waited 5 months before I heard anything back they run a background they run a drug test they run a physical screen they check your references they do a very thorough background check before they hire you
Interview Questions: How many years experience did I have

title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 weeks. I interviewed at Community Health System - CA
Interview Descriptions: Basic interview with the manager and supervisors. Dress business casual. Don’t wear scrubs.  Just be yourself and answer honestly.  It’s always a good idea to research the company and the unit you are applying for.
Interview Questions: How do you handle stress?

title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied through other source. I interviewed at Community Health System - CA (Fresno, CA) in Jan 2018
Interview Descriptions: For the ED, i was interviewed by panel of 4 including the director and two managers, and recruiter. It was intimidating however, they made me feel comfortable. The most important thing is they want to know how you handled pressure because working in the ED will be stressful most days.
Interview Questions: They gave me a scenario, Basically how you would deal with it in certain situations.

title: Patient Representative - Executive Director Admitting Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Community Health System - CA
Interview Descriptions: Asked about education and experience. Knowledge of work performance. Offer training after hired. You get job offer from recruiter not in the spot during interview. Supervisor will train you to bill correctly. Then a senior worker will shadow you as you train to work. Three week process of training.
Interview Questions: Tell me about yourself?

title: Critical Care RN Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at Community Health System - CA (Fresno, CA)
Interview Descriptions: I applied online and a week or so later the unit manager called me and asked me to come in for an interview. I interviewed with the unit manger and one of the charge nurses.
Interview Questions: she gave me a hypothetical patient and asked me what i would do.

title: Staff RN Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Community Health System - CA
Interview Descriptions: Applied online then had 2 phone interviews with HR and unit manager. After that a face to face interview with manager. Took about 3 weeks till I get an offer.
Interview Questions: What is the most important thing to work at medical/surgical unit?

title: RN Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Community Health System - CA (Fresno, CA)
Interview Descriptions: Met with Manager and Director after receiving a call approx 2 weeks after electronic submission of application. Quite casual and basic interview questions asked before tour of unit. Usual interview questions asked, no quizzes or surprising questions.
Interview Questions: What makes you a good fit for this position? For this hospital unit?

title: RN Staff Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at Community Health System - CA
Interview Descriptions: I applied online for a position and was contacted the next day to set up an interview. The interview process was very easy; the nurse recruiter and nurse manager were very friendly and helpful throughout the process.
Interview Questions: I was not asked traditional interview questions but scenario questions and how I would respond.

title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Community Health System - CA
Interview Descriptions: I applied online via CRMC's career section. I was invited by a CRMC recruiter to attend open house. During open house, I had the opportunity to interact with nursing managers. I handed my resume portfolio to the nursing manager and a few days later I was contacted for an interview.
Interview Questions: Why do you want to work for CRMC?

title: Digital Producer Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 months. I interviewed at Community Health System - CA (Fresno, CA)
Interview Descriptions: Received a call from their recruiter. Heard nothing for about 2 weeks, then had a follow call. Heard nothing for about a month and was asked to submit material. 3 weeks after that I was invited for an in person interview. The in person interview was pretty relaxed. Interviewed by hiring manager and his boss. The hiring manager had questions from script, and took notes. We discussed the reasons the position came about and what they ideally wanted from the candidate.
Interview Questions: What would you do if you were in a situation where you were the only one in a team that saw an issue from a different perspective?

title: Admitting Interviewer Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 weeks. I interviewed at Community Health System - CA (Fresno, CA) in Jul 2016
Interview Descriptions: Very Professional. Very Positive. Very Informative. Very Detailed. The Panel of Interviewers were friendly and hospitable. The questions they inquired were appropriate and easy to understand. The explanation of the job description and expectations were to the point and understandable. Plenty of professional laughter which made the interview less intimidating. The facilities atmosphere was very clean and inviting. I was not selected but will be applying to any future needs for the Admitting Interviewer position at Community Regional Medical Center.
Interview Questions: What would you do with a patient complaint.

title: Practice Office Manager Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Community Health System - CA (Stockton, CA) in Jun 2016
Interview Descriptions: First contact from COO secretary by cell phone to make an appointmnet for an phone interview, Chief Operational Officer call me and we talk around 30-45 minutes and later another call from his secretary for a Panel Group interview with the COO and other Managers
Interview Questions: Work Scenarios

title: Pharmacist Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 6 weeks. I interviewed at Community Health System - CA (Fresno, CA) in Jun 2016
Interview Descriptions: This was a 3 on one interview with the Pharmacy manager,  Pharmacy Supervisor, and Pharmacy Technician Supervisor.  The atmosphere was very relaxed and they asked questions pertaining to the job duties. Preparation for this interview was to prepare knowledge and past experiences to relate to.
Interview Questions: What kind of experience do you have with hospital pharmacy?

title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Community Health System - CA (Fresno, CA) in Mar 2016
Interview Descriptions: I applied online and got a call for interview a week later. The interview lasted about an hour. The interview was easier than I had expected. Overall, it was an easy if well prepared.
Interview Questions: Tell us about a difficult patient you had.

title: Staff Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at Community Health System - CA (Fresno, CA)
Interview Descriptions: Short sweet and too the point. The person whop interviewed me knew that I was qualified based off of my resume and the interview focused on whether or not I actually knowledgeable or not
Interview Questions: Some clinical questions

title: Surgical Technologist Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 months. I interviewed at Community Health System - CA
Interview Descriptions: The interview was a fairly easy interview. The OR management interviewed me and asked about skills/ education etc for about 20 minutes, then gave me a tour of the hospital. I didn't actually hear back from the hospital in regards to the interview for about 2 months.
Interview Questions: What is one of the hardest things you've had to do while on the job?

title: Analyst Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Community Health System - CA
Interview Descriptions: The interview process was pretty rigorous. I participated in 2 phone interviews.  The phone interviews were pretty easy and the folks I spoke with were easy going, making it a comfortable-free flowing conversation.  I did not receive many technical related questions.  It was geared towards a regurgitation of my resume and elaborating on a few items.  Following the phone interviews, I was invited to a face to face interview.  I interviewed with several teams, each being an hour long.  Many of the questions I received were about my interaction and/or involvement with other application teams, technical questions, and skill level with various Microsoft programs.  It was easy to speak and all the teams; again, making it a light and easy free flowing interview.  There were even personal questions about hobbies and family.
Interview Questions: Explain the steps you must take to create users in the system.

title: Customer Service Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 5 months. I interviewed at Community Health System - CA (Fresno, CA)
Interview Descriptions:
Group interview with manager and 2 current employees that will possibly be your new co-workers. 

Questions asked from manager and co-workers about medical field an working in the ER
Interview Questions: Just basic questions about working in a Hospital environment and in the ER ,if your able to handle blood, Sick patients,  Accidents and Traumas

title: Front Desk Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Community Health System - CA (Fresno, CA) in Jan 2014
Interview Descriptions: My interview was extremely basic, however it does depend on the job to which you are applying on the difficultly of the interview of course. Other than the basic interview questions there was not anything out of the ordinary with my interview experience at community.
Interview Questions: Strengths and weaknesses?

title: Registered Nurse II Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. The process took 3 weeks. I interviewed at Community Health System - CA
Interview Descriptions: I was not able to get a call back by going through human resources.  They rarely returned calls and unhelpful, they only seem to be interested in the company and not advocating for employees.  But if you know someone already employed, it's your best shot at getting an interview with the director. My interview consisted of problem solving questions, customer service and how do I resolve issues with coworkers.
Interview Questions: What was my 5 year plan?

title: RN - Staff Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at Community Health System - CA (Fresno, CA) in Sept 2013
Interview Descriptions: Professional, yet personal as well. No invasive questioning but the interviewer made me feel like she was really trying to help me evaluate the facility for my own opinions.  They answered many of my questions about the facility honestly and never attempted to scare or scrutinize my knowledge. After the interview, I waited a few days and then called her back and was awarded the job.
Interview Questions:
Where do you see yourself in the next 5 years?
What makes you want to work here?
What are you strengths?

title: Administrative Secretary Interview
Application Type: I applied through a recruiter. I interviewed at Community Health System - CA (Fresno, CA) in Feb 2013
Interview Descriptions: Collecting proceeds, answering phones, handling miscellaneous duties as directed by the physicians.  Worked with the PA's as well as with the Neurosurgeon and Neurology.  You worked with so many type of people not only the medical personnel but with the medical community as well.
Interview Questions: Do how excel skills

title: Clinical Systems Manager Interview
Application Type: I applied through a recruiter. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Community Health System - CA (Fresno, CA) in Jul 2012
Interview Descriptions: I met with the manager and lead I would be working for at a Mexican restaurant first for a very pleasant meeting, and then with I believe 4 different groups of coworkers I would be working with which was equally pleasant.
Interview Questions: There were no harsh or intimidating questions--just questions about past work, work ethic, what I am looking for, and what I would be looking for in the future.  A couple common problem solving questions were asked, but they were expecting to train someone in Epic from the ground up, so there were no Epic questions.

title: Nutrition Care Clerk Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Community Health System - CA (Clovis, CA) in Feb 2012
Interview Descriptions: Panel of 3. Each took turn asking questions, and these are not planned questions that will be asked. It was more of on the go questions that you will get determining your answer to the question prior. Dress is casual business, but you always want to dress to impress.
Interview Questions: What those customer service mean to you?

title: Registered Nurse II Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 weeks. I interviewed at Community Health System - CA (Fresno, CA) in Dec 2011
Interview Descriptions: You'll receive a call from HR.  Then you will come in to the interview with RN Manager and maybe a couple of supervisors.  It's pretty informal.  The people are very nice and friendly
Interview Questions: Why do you choose here as an employer of choice

title: Staff RN Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at Community Health System - CA (Clovis, CA) in Feb 2011
Interview Descriptions: The interview was simple, it was not intimidating.  The questions were fair.  The interview was concise, they asked non-threatening questions and used my experience, and a personal recommendation.
Interview Questions: What is the team spirit like.
